hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOIT.JOB_ID, EOIT.JOB_CODE, EOIT.NAME, EOIT.NAME_CN, EOIT.CUSTOMER_CODE, EOIT.CUSTOMER_NAME, EOIT.STATUS, EOIT.REMARK, EOIT.ORG_ID, U1.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN CREATOR_NAME, EOIT.CREATE_TIME, EOIT.MODIFIER, U2.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN MODIFIER_NAME, EOIT.MODIFY_TIME, EOIT.TIME_ZONE, EOIT.REC_VER, EOIT.REC_STATUS, EOIT.ENABLED_FLAG, EOIT.ORDER_TYPE from EO_ORDER_IMPORT_TEMPLATE EOIT left join ES_USER U1 ON EOIT.CREATOR = U1.ESUS_ID left join ES_USER U2 ON EOIT.MODIFIER = U2.ESUS_ID where 1 = 1 <<and eoit.order_type in (:orderTypes)>> <<and EOIT.JOB_ID=:jobId>> <<and EOIT.JOB_CODE=:jobCode>> <<and EOIT.NAME like :name>> <<and EOIT.NAME_CN like :nameCn>> <<and EOIT.CUSTOMER_CODE=:customerCode>> <<and EOIT.CUSTOMER_NAME like :customerName>> <<and EOIT.STATUS=:status>> <<and EOIT.REMARK=:remark>> <<and EOIT.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<and EOIT.CREATOR=:creator>> <<and EOIT.CREATE_TIME=:createTime>> <<and EOIT.MODIFIER=:modifier>> <<and EOIT.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and EOIT.TIME_ZONE=:timeZone>> <<and EOIT.REC_VER=:recVer>> <<and EOIT.REC_STATUS=:recStatus>> <<and EOIT.ENABLED_FLAG=:enabledFlag>> ORDER BY EOIT.CREATE_TIME DESC
